LanguageData.Ind_IndustrialBattery.label: industrial battery
LanguageData.Ind_IndustrialBattery.description: Stable and reliable industrial battery, more efficient than normal battery. It won't catch fire or cause shortcut due to better safety design.
LanguageData.Ind_IndustrialCable.label: industrial cable
LanguageData.Ind_IndustrialCable.description: A set of reinforced and fireproof electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.Ind_NuclearPowerPlant.label: nuclear power plant
LanguageData.Ind_NuclearPowerPlant.description: A nuclear power plant, 20kW power output. Uses uranium as fuel.
